text: PM or pm may refer to: *Post meridiem (p.m.), the second half of the day on a 12-hour clock *Prime minister *Promethium (symbol Pm), a chemical element *Petametre (Pm), a unit of length (1015 m) *Picometre (pm), a unit of length (10âˆ’12 m) *Picomolar (pM), a unit of molar concentration *Particulate matter, very small particles suspended in the air *Saint Pierre and Miquelon (ISO country code) **.pm, internet top-level domain for Saint Pierre and Miquelon ==Related pages== * *
title: PM
